analyzed: 'gog pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bltas na yod pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: And cessation is not existent, when seen as it really is.

original: rtag pa nyid du 'dzin pa ldog pa yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid du 'dzin pa ldog pa yin te /
translated: Because the conception of permanence is eliminated.

original: gang gi phyir dngos po rnams 'gog pa mthong ba de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po rnams 'gog pa mthong ba de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cessation of things is seen.ğŸ”½Thus, those two, etc.

original: de ltar na de dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de dag yod pa nyid kyi mtha' can dang med pa nyid kyi mtha' can pa gnyis po dag go //
analyzed: de ltar na de dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de dag yod pa nyid kyi mtha' can dang med pa nyid kyi mtha' can pa gnyis po dag go //
translated: Those two are the extreme of existence and the extreme of nonexistence.ğŸ”½Having abandoned means having completely rejected.

original: spangs te zhes bya ba ni yongs su dor nas de gcig pu yod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: spangs te zhes bya ba ni yongs su dor nas de gcig pu yod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not to be made into a mere unity,

original: rtag par smra bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag par smra bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that one would be advocating eternalism.

original: gcig pu med pa nyid du yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig pu med pa nyid du yang ma yin te /

original: chad par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chad par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that one would be advocating nihilism.

original: 'on kyang dbu ma'i lam gyi chos bshad de zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'on kyang dbu ma'i lam gyi chos bshad de zhes bya ba la /
translated: However, the Dharma of the middle way is explained.

original: dbu ma'i lam ni shing tu yod pa nyid ma yin zhing shin tu med pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: dbu ma'i lam ni shing tu yod pa nyid ma yin zhing shin tu med pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: The middle way is not at all existence and is not at all nonexistence.

original: shin tu yod pa nyid ma yin pa ni skad cig ma nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / gnyen po rnyed par gyur pa na rgyun gyi mtha' yang chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu yod pa nyid ma yin pa ni skad cig ma nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / gnyen po rnyed par gyur pa na rgyun gyi mtha' yang chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not utterly existent because it is momentary and because when the antidote is obtained, the continuum is severed.

original: shin tu med pa nyid kyang ma yin la skad cig skad cig la yod pa'i phyir dang / gnyen po rnyed par gyur pa na tshu rol gyi rgyun yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu med pa nyid kyang ma yin la skad cig skad cig la yod pa'i phyir dang / gnyen po rnyed par gyur pa na tshu rol gyi rgyun yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is not utterly nonexistent because it exists from moment to moment and because when the antidote is obtained, the continuum of the present exists.

original: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba de ni nye bar ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba de ni nye bar ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase â€œit is like thisâ€ indicates the teaching.

original: 'di yod na zhes bya ba ni rgyu yin la /ğŸ”½'di @101a * //
analyzed: 'di yod na zhes bya ba ni rgyu yin la / 'di @101a * //
translated: The phrase â€œwhen this existsâ€ indicates the cause.

original: yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'bras bur 'gyur ba ste 'dis ni rgyur smra ba bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'bras bur 'gyur ba ste 'dis ni rgyur smra ba bsal ba yin no //
translated: The phrase â€œthis comes to beâ€ indicates the result.ğŸ”½Thus, this passage refutes the theory of causation.

original: de lta na ni rgyu rtag pa las 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na ni rgyu rtag pa las 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then the result would arise from a permanent cause.

original: de'i phyir 'di skyes pa las 'di skye ba ste zhes bya ba smos pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di skyes pa las 'di skye ba ste zhes bya ba smos pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the root text states, â€œFrom the arising of this, that arises.â€

original: 'di zhes bya ba rgyu skyes pa las 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dis ni rgyu rtag par smra ba bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba rgyu skyes pa las 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dis ni rgyu rtag par smra ba bsal ba yin te /
translated: The phrase from this cause, that effect arises eliminates the theory of a permanent cause.

original: rgyu skye ba'i chos can nyid yin ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu skye ba'i chos can nyid yin ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause is a thing that arises.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: The phrase for example indicates that the following is a simile.

original: ma rig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngon gyi skye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa 'dir ma rig pa'i sgra dang / las kyi gnas skabs la 'du byed kyi sgra dang / phung po lnga nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma rnam par shes pa'i sgras bstan to //
analyzed: ma rig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngon gyi skye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa 'dir ma rig pa'i sgra dang / las kyi gnas skabs la 'du byed kyi sgra dang / phung po lnga nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig ma rnam par shes pa'i sgras bstan to //
translated: The term ignorance refers to the state of affliction in a previous birth; the term volitional formations refers to the state of karma; and the term consciousness refers to the moment of conception of the five aggregates.

original: rnam par shes pa'i las 'og ji srid skye mched drug skyes par ma gyur pa'i gnas skabs la ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i las 'og ji srid skye mched drug skyes par ma gyur pa'i gnas skabs la ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o //
translated: The state of consciousness that follows this moment of conception and lasts until the six sense bases have developed is called name-and-form.ğŸ”½The six sense bases are so called because they are the six sense bases that develop from name-and-form.

original: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa 'dus pa las gong du ni skye mched drug yin la /ğŸ”½yul la sogs pa 'dus par gyur pa ni reg pa yin no //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa 'dus pa las gong du ni skye mched drug yin la /ğŸ”½yul la sogs pa 'dus par gyur pa ni reg pa yin no //
translated: The meeting of the object, the sense faculty, and consciousness is contact.

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa yongs su gcod par nus pa ni tshor ba yin la /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa yongs su gcod par nus pa ni tshor ba yin la /
translated: Feeling is the ability to discriminate pleasure, etc.

original: longs spyod dang 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnas skabs sred pa yin no //
analyzed: longs spyod dang 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnas skabs sred pa yin no //
translated: Craving is the state of craving for the objects of sexual passion.

original: gang gi tshe long sa spyod kyi rgyu mtshan tshol bar rtsom par byed pa dang kun nas rgyug par byed pa de'i tshe len pa'i gnas skabs yin la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe long sa spyod kyi rgyu mtshan tshol bar rtsom par byed pa dang kun nas rgyug par byed pa de'i tshe len pa'i gnas skabs yin la /
translated: When one begins to seek the objects of sexual passion and runs around everywhere, that is the state of grasping.

original: yang srid kyi las kyi gnas skabs ni srid pa yin no //
analyzed: yang srid kyi las kyi gnas skabs ni srid pa yin no //
translated: Becoming is the state of action that leads to rebirth.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba yang skye ba yin la /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i nyid mtshams sbyor ba yang skye ba yin la /
translated: Birth is the future rebirth.

original: ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba ste ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i yan lag bzhi po la rga shi zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba ste ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i yan lag bzhi po la rga shi zhes bya'o //
translated: The four future members of the chain of dependent origination, namely, name-and-form, the six sense spheres, contact, and feeling, are called old age and death.

original: de'i phyir 'du byed kyi rgyu ni ma rig pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'du byed kyi rgyu ni ma rig pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the cause of the formative forces is ignorance.

original: ma rig pa 'di yod na 'du byed 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma rig pa 'di yod na 'du byed 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When there is ignorance, the formative forces occur.

original: de bzhin du ji srid skye ba dang rga shi'i bar gyi rgyu yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du ji srid skye ba dang rga shi'i bar gyi rgyu yin te /
translated: Similarly, up to the cause of birth and old age and death.

original: skye ba yod na rga shi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye ba yod na rga shi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If there is birth, then aging and death occur.

original: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba nas skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba nas skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag par 'gyur ro //
translated: When ignorance ceases, then the conditioning factors cease. When birth ceases, then aging and death cease.

original: de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'di zhes bya ba la 'ba' zhig po zhes bya ba ni bdag gi ma gtogs pa sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya @101b ba'o ;
analyzed: de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'di zhes bya ba la 'ba' zhig po zhes bya ba ni bdag gi ma gtogs pa sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya @101b ba'o ;
translated: Thus, this entire mass of suffering ceases. The phrase â€œthis entire mass of sufferingâ€ means that, apart from the self, the great mass of suffering ceases.

original: / rig byed las bstan pa'i zhi ba'i las bya ba ni zhi ba bgyi ba'o //
analyzed: / rig byed las bstan pa'i zhi ba'i las bya ba ni zhi ba bgyi ba'o //
translated: The phrase â€œto be done in a peaceful wayâ€ means to be done in a way that is taught in the Vedas.

original: dge ba'i tshul du blo mthun pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu rigs par byed pa ni dge ba yin par rig par bya la /
analyzed: dge ba'i tshul du blo mthun pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu rigs par byed pa ni dge ba yin par rig par bya la /
translated: The phrase â€œin a virtuous way and in a way that is agreeable to many peopleâ€ means that what is very reasonable is to be known as virtuous.

original: shin tu dge ba ni dge ba'i tshul des skye bo mang po blo mthun pa ste 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu dge ba ni dge ba'i tshul des skye bo mang po blo mthun pa ste 'dod pa'o //
translated: What is very virtuous is agreeable to many people in the sense that it is agreeable to them.

original: dben pa'i gnas nas zhes bya ba ni gsang la skye bo 'du ba dang bral ba'i sa phyogs las so //
analyzed: dben pa'i gnas nas zhes bya ba ni gsang la skye bo 'du ba dang bral ba'i sa phyogs las so //
translated: The phrase â€œin a secluded placeâ€ means in a place that is hidden and free of crowds.

original: sngon gyi skyes pa'i rabs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i 'du shes zhes bya ba ni skye ba gzhan du byas pa'i las dang 'dra ba'i 'du shes kyis so //
analyzed: sngon gyi skyes pa'i rabs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i 'du shes zhes bya ba ni skye ba gzhan du byas pa'i las dang 'dra ba'i 'du shes kyis so //
translated: The idea of conformity with the Jataka stories is the idea of karma done in other lives.

original: dad pa skyes te zhes bya ba ni dad pa skyes par gyur pa'o //ğŸ”½dge ba'i bsam pas zhes bya ba ni sems rnyog pa med pa'am /
analyzed: dad pa skyes te zhes bya ba ni dad pa skyes par gyur pa'o // dge ba'i bsam pas zhes bya ba ni sems rnyog pa med pa'am /
translated: Having given rise to faith means having given rise to faith.ğŸ”½ With a virtuous intention means with a mind free from defilements,

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bsam pas so //
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bsam pas so //
translated: or with an intention free from wrongdoing.

original: sdig pa spangs na zhes bya ba ni mi tshangs par spyod par byed pa'i sdig pa spangs na'o //
analyzed: sdig pa spangs na zhes bya ba ni mi tshangs par spyod par byed pa'i sdig pa spangs na'o //
translated: If one abandons evil means if one abandons the evil of engaging in sexual misconduct.

original: gsang ba'i rgyan ni sba bar bya ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: gsang ba'i rgyan ni sba bar bya ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: Secret ornaments are those that should be concealed,

original: rtag tu ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: which are not permanent.

original: phyi rol gyi rgyan ni gang rtag tu ba ma yin ba sba bar bya ba ma yin bdag yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rgyan ni gang rtag tu ba ma yin ba sba bar bya ba ma yin bdag yin te /
translated: External ornaments are those that are not permanent and should not be concealed,

original: gang dag go rims bzhin du nyi ma nyi mar longs spyad par bya ba yin pa'i phyi rol gyi rgyan yin no //
analyzed: gang dag go rims bzhin du nyi ma nyi mar longs spyad par bya ba yin pa'i phyi rol gyi rgyan yin no //
translated: which are external ornaments that should be enjoyed day by day, respectively.

original: bram ze dbul ba zhes bya ba ni bram ze dag las shin tu dbul ba'o //
analyzed: bram ze dbul ba zhes bya ba ni bram ze dag las shin tu dbul ba'o //
translated: The phrase a poor brahmin means a brahmin who is very poor.

original: bsod nams chen po zhes bya ba ni bsod nams kyis chen por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams chen po zhes bya ba ni bsod nams kyis chen por gyur pa'o //
translated: The phrase great merit means that he has become great through merit.

original: snga na med pa'i rtags dang cha lugs 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni rtags ni sngon mthong bar ma gyur pas na med pa'o //
analyzed: snga na med pa'i rtags dang cha lugs 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni rtags ni sngon mthong bar ma gyur pas na med pa'o //
translated: The phrase wearing an unprecedented sign and attire means that the sign is unprecedented because it has not been seen before.

original: mtshan ma ste skra dang kha spu bregs pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma ste skra dang kha spu bregs pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The sign is a mark, such as the tonsure and the wearing of robes.

original: cha lugs ni gos rnam pa gzhan du 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: cha lugs ni gos rnam pa gzhan du 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The attire is the wearing of robes that are different from the others.

original: mi gsang ba'i phyogs zhes bya ba ni mi dben pa'i phyogs su'o //
analyzed: mi gsang ba'i phyogs zhes bya ba ni mi dben pa'i phyogs su'o //
translated: The phrase in a public place means in a place that is not secluded.

original: 'bras dmar po'i chan ni dri ma can las bsgrubs pa'i 'bras chan no //
analyzed: 'bras dmar po'i chan ni dri ma can las bsgrubs pa'i 'bras chan no //
translated: The phrase red rice soup means rice soup that is prepared with impure ingredients.

original: gzhan mon sran sde'u la sogs pa dang / chu 'ba' zhig gis bsgrubs pa lan tshva la sogs pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang bral ba'i sran tshod ni sran tshod yan lag gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan mon sran sde'u la sogs pa dang / chu 'ba' zhig gis bsgrubs pa lan tshva la sogs pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang bral ba'i sran tshod ni sran tshod yan lag gnyis pa'o //
translated: Other ingredients, such as mung beans, are prepared with only water, salt, etc., and are free of any preparation. This is the two-ingredient soup.

original: rgyal po tha ma zhes bya ba la 'di ni rgyal po kun gyi tha mar gyur cing snying po ma yin par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal po tha ma zhes bya ba la 'di ni rgyal po kun gyi tha mar gyur cing snying po ma yin par gyur pa'o //
translated: The last king is so called because he is the last of all the kings and because he is not the essence.

original: chos ma yin pa la brten pa zhes bya ba ni tshul ma yin pa la mngon par chags pa can no //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa la brten pa zhes bya ba ni tshul ma yin pa la mngon par chags pa can no //
translated: He is called â€œthe one who relies on what is not Dharmaâ€ because he is attached to what is not the proper conduct.

original: phyogs gtsang mar zhes bya ba ni dben la chu lud dang bral bar ro //
analyzed: phyogs gtsang mar zhes bya ba ni dben la chu lud dang bral bar ro //
translated: In a pure region means in a secluded place free from water and fertilizer.

original: rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /ğŸ”½skye dgu mgu bar @102a * //
analyzed: rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / skye dgu mgu bar @102a * //
translated: The king, etc.

original: byed ; dga' ba ba byed pa'i phyir rgyal po yin la /
analyzed: byed ; dga' ba ba byed pa'i phyir rgyal po yin la /
translated: The king is so called because he delights the people.

original: zad cing gdung bar byed pa las skyob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rgyal rigs yin zhing /
analyzed: zad cing gdung bar byed pa las skyob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rgyal rigs yin zhing /
translated: The warrior class is so called because it protects from exhaustion and torment.

original: ya rabs kyis spyi bos phyag byas pa nyid kyi phyir spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yin no //
analyzed: ya rabs kyis spyi bos phyag byas pa nyid kyi phyir spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yin no //
translated: The one anointed on the head is so called because the righteous honor him with their heads.

original: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i zas ni ci 'dod pa'i kha zas so //
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i zas ni ci 'dod pa'i kha zas so //
translated: Food as desired is food that is desired.

original: las byed la rag lus pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: las byed la rag lus pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: Dependent on the work means

original: las byed ni zas kyi bya ba byed pa'i dbang byed dag go //
analyzed: las byed ni zas kyi bya ba byed pa'i dbang byed dag go //
translated: The function is the activity of eating.

original: dge slong dag ni sbyin gnas yin te /
analyzed: dge slong dag ni sbyin gnas yin te /
translated: Monks are the recipients of gifts,

original: gang gi phyir de dag ni bsod pa dang ngan pa dag las sems 'gyur ba med pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de dag ni bsod pa dang ngan pa dag las sems 'gyur ba med pa yin te /
translated: because their minds are unmoved by good or bad qualities,

original: sems 'dul ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems 'dul ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are disciplined in mind.

original: dbang po phab ste zhes bya ba ni yul dag las bsdus nas so //ğŸ”½gang gis mthong ba'am /
analyzed: dbang po phab ste zhes bya ba ni yul dag las bsdus nas so // gang gis mthong ba'am /
translated: Having lowered their senses means having withdrawn from the objects.

original: gang gis thos pa de la gar dang glu bzang ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gis thos pa de la gar dang glu bzang ba yin no //
translated: Whoever sees or hears that is a good song and dance.

original: gsad par 'os pa yin pa'i phyir gsad par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gsad par 'os pa yin pa'i phyir gsad par bya ba yin te /
translated: They are to be killed because they deserve to be killed,

original: srog dang bral bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: srog dang bral bar bya ba'o //
translated: because they are to be deprived of life.

original: mu dang khad chad du gang ba zhes bya ba la mu zhes bya ba ni kha'i phyogs yin la de dang mnyam par gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mu dang khad chad du gang ba zhes bya ba la mu zhes bya ba ni kha'i phyogs yin la de dang mnyam par gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Filled to the brim means filled to the edge, filled to the limit.

original: ljongs thams cad kyi grong khyer bzang po zhes bya ba ni ljongs thams cad las 'byor pa khyad par du 'phags pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir ljongs thams cad kyi grong khyer bzang po'o //
analyzed: ljongs thams cad kyi grong khyer bzang po zhes bya ba ni ljongs thams cad las 'byor pa khyad par du 'phags pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir ljongs thams cad kyi grong khyer bzang po'o //
translated: The best city of all countries is the best city of all countries because of its especially excellent wealth.

original: bdag cag dge slong gang dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bdag cag dge slong gang dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: We, monks, and so on.

original: gar lta ba las ldog pa 'dzin pa dang / rol mo'i sgra nyan pa las ldog pa'i 'dzin pas bslab pa yongs su blangs nas so //
analyzed: gar lta ba las ldog pa 'dzin pa dang / rol mo'i sgra nyan pa las ldog pa'i 'dzin pas bslab pa yongs su blangs nas so //
translated: Having taken up the training by turning away from looking at dancing and by turning away from listening to music,

original: 'dri bar ma spobs pa ni tshig gis dris pa'i sgo nas spobs par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: 'dri bar ma spobs pa ni tshig gis dris pa'i sgo nas spobs par dka' ba'o //
translated: not daring to ask means it is difficult to be confident by asking with words.

original: bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba'i bde legs su byed pa ni 'dir bu mo don du gnyer bar byed pa ston pa yin par rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba'i bde legs su byed pa ni 'dir bu mo don du gnyer bar byed pa ston pa yin par rigs par bya'o //
translated: The one who makes well-being is the one who makes well-being here, and it should be understood that the girl is the one who is sought after.

original: blangs pa zhes pa ni me skor byas pa'o //ğŸ”½zhim po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: blangs pa zhes pa ni me skor byas pa'o // zhim po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Having taken means having made a fire offering.ğŸ”½In fragrant and so on,

original: zhim po ni bsod pa'am dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: zhim po ni bsod pa'am dri ma med pa'o //
translated: fragrant means delicious or stainless.

original: stod g-yogs ni steng nas bgo bar bya ba yin /ğŸ”½smad g-yogs ni 'og tu bgo bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: stod g-yogs ni steng nas bgo bar bya ba yin / smad g-yogs ni 'og tu bgo bar bya ba yin no //
translated: The upper robe is worn on top.ğŸ”½The lower robe is worn on the bottom.

original: kha cig bzang po ni gos yin la /
analyzed: kha cig bzang po ni gos yin la /
translated: Some say: The upper robe is the best of the three robes.

original: 'dis gnas par byed /
analyzed: 'dis gnas par byed /
translated: One lives by it,ğŸ”½and one relies on it.

original: rten par byed ces bya ba'i dbang du byas nas zas yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: rten par byed ces bya ba'i dbang du byas nas zas yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: They say that food is that by which one lives and relies.

original: nyon mongs pa ste 'dod pa des shin tu gzir ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ste 'dod pa des shin tu gzir ba'o //
translated: One is oppressed by that craving which is an affliction.

original: skyes bu'i sems 'dzin par byed pa des blta zhing g-yo ba'o /
analyzed: skyes bu'i sems 'dzin par byed pa des blta zhing g-yo ba'o /
translated: One looks at it and moves about because of that which holds the mind of a person.

original: @102b ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ma 'dres pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa yin te /
analyzed: @102b ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ma 'dres pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa yin te /
translated: The five unmixed dharmas and so on. The five unmixed dharmas are not shared in common.

original: bud med 'ga' zhig kho na'i yin gyi thams cad kyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bud med 'ga' zhig kho na'i yin gyi thams cad kyi ni ma yin no //
translated: They belong to a certain woman, but not to all.

original: mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni mkhas pa'i rnam pa dang 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni mkhas pa'i rnam pa dang 'dra ba ste /
translated: Having the nature of a wise person means having the appearance of a wise person.

original: skyes bu chags par gyur pa dang chags pa dang bral bar gyur pa nyid shes pa ste /
analyzed: skyes bu chags par gyur pa dang chags pa dang bral bar gyur pa nyid shes pa ste /
translated: It is the knowledge of whether a person is attached or free from attachment.

original: gnas skabs kyi bye brag shes pa ni dang po'o //ğŸ”½zla mtshan gyi dus ni mngal yongs su 'dzin pa'i dus yin la /
analyzed: gnas skabs kyi bye brag shes pa ni dang po'o // zla mtshan gyi dus ni mngal yongs su 'dzin pa'i dus yin la /
translated: The first is the knowledge of the specific time.ğŸ”½The second is the knowledge of the time of menstruation, which is the time of conception.

original: zla mtshan zhes bya ba ni khrag gi dri ma 'dzag pa'i lhag ma las khrag gi thigs pa gnyis sam gsum yin te /
analyzed: zla mtshan zhes bya ba ni khrag gi dri ma 'dzag pa'i lhag ma las khrag gi thigs pa gnyis sam gsum yin te /
translated: Menstruation is the two or three drops of blood that remain after the discharge of the menstrual flow.

original: bud med kyis de'i dus shes pa ni gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: bud med kyis de'i dus shes pa ni gnyis pa yin no //
translated: The third is the knowledge of the time of menstruation by the woman.

original: mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni mngal du sems can zhugs pa shes pa ste gsum pa yin no //
analyzed: mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni mngal du sems can zhugs pa shes pa ste gsum pa yin no //
translated: The third is the knowledge of the entry of the embryo, that is, the entry of the being into the womb.

original: gang gi thad las zhes bya ba ni skyes bu mang po dag yongs su spyod par gyur pa na mngal skyed par byed pa'i skyes bu shes pa ni bzhi pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi thad las zhes bya ba ni skyes bu mang po dag yongs su spyod par gyur pa na mngal skyed par byed pa'i skyes bu shes pa ni bzhi pa yin no //
translated: The fourth is the knowledge of the man from whom the conception has occurred, when many men have had intercourse with the woman.

original: mngal gyi bye brag khye'u dang / bu mor shes pa ni lnga pa yin no //ğŸ”½'dod pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang yongs su bral bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mngal gyi bye brag khye'u dang / bu mor shes pa ni lnga pa yin no //ğŸ”½'dod pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang yongs su bral bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The fifth is the knowledge of the sex of the embryo, whether it is a boy or a girl.ğŸ”½The sixth is the knowledge of the birth of a handsome child, one who is complete in all his major and minor body parts, and who is healthy, with keen faculties. ğŸ”½The seventh is the knowledge of the birth of a child who is the opposite of that.

original: brtan por gyis shig ces bya ba ni skyo ba'i sgo nas sngar bar ma byed cig pa'o //
analyzed: brtan por gyis shig ces bya ba ni skyo ba'i sgo nas sngar bar ma byed cig pa'o //
translated: â€œBe firmâ€ means do not be discouraged.

original: stobs dang ldan par zhes bya ba ni stobs dang bcas par ro //
analyzed: stobs dang ldan par zhes bya ba ni stobs dang bcas par ro //
translated: â€œBe strongâ€ means be powerful.

original: bcom pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su phrogs pa dang bcom pa dang yongs su zad par byas pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bcom pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su phrogs pa dang bcom pa dang yongs su zad par byas pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: â€œBe victoriousâ€ means be completely victorious, be completely destroyed, be completely exhausted.

original: rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni g-yul gyi stobs bshig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni g-yul gyi stobs bshig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: â€œBe victoriousâ€ means be victorious in battle.

original: 'jigs pa zhes bya ba ni nus pa bcom par gyur pas skrag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jigs pa zhes bya ba ni nus pa bcom par gyur pas skrag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: â€œBe frightenedâ€ means be terrified because your power has been destroyed.

original: bcom pa ni nus pa bcom pa dang spangs pa yin te //
analyzed: bcom pa ni nus pa bcom pa dang spangs pa yin te //
translated: â€œBe destroyedâ€ means be destroyed, be abandoned, be powerless.

original: mngon du phyogs pa dang 'gro ba dang bsnun pa'i nus pa med par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mngon du phyogs pa dang 'gro ba dang bsnun pa'i nus pa med par gyur pa'o //
translated: â€œBe turned awayâ€ means be powerless to face, go, or strike.

original: bdag po dman par gyur pas sde dpon yang dman par gyur pa'i phyir phab par byas pa'o //
analyzed: bdag po dman par gyur pas sde dpon yang dman par gyur pa'i phyir phab par byas pa'o //
translated: â€œBe brought downâ€ means be brought down because your master is inferior and your general is inferior.

original: dgra bo la rgyab kyis phyogs par gang gis byas pa de pha rol la rgyab kyis phyogs par byas pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bo la rgyab kyis phyogs par gang gis byas pa de pha rol la rgyab kyis phyogs par byas pa'o //
translated: â€œBe turned away from the enemyâ€ means be turned away from the enemy.

original: rtsig pa'i khar sbrengs te 'khod de zhes bya ba ni rtsig pa'i khar dpung bu chung gis phreng ba bzhin du rnam par bskor bas na rtsig pa'i khar sbrengs pa'o //ğŸ”½dpa' bo bzang po zhes bya ba ni @103a * //
analyzed: rtsig pa'i khar sbrengs te 'khod de zhes bya ba ni rtsig pa'i khar dpung bu chung gis phreng ba bzhin du rnam par bskor bas na rtsig pa'i khar sbrengs pa'o // dpa' bo bzang po zhes bya ba ni @103a * //
translated: They are arranged on the wall because they are arranged in a row on the wall, like a row of pegs.

original: g-yul la dpa' ba'o //
analyzed: g-yul la dpa' ba'o //
translated: The good heroes are the heroes in battle.

original: blon po ni blo'i grogs su gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: blon po ni blo'i grogs su gyur pa yin la /
translated: The ministers are the assistants of the mind.

original: blon po dag las shin tu nang gi yan lag tu gyur pa ni blon po chen po'o //
analyzed: blon po dag las shin tu nang gi yan lag tu gyur pa ni blon po chen po'o //
translated: The great ministers are the most intimate of the ministers.

original: phyi phyir zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du'o //
analyzed: phyi phyir zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du'o //
translated: The again and again means repeatedly.

original: sa brkos pa'i 'dab ma bting nas zhes bya ba ni sa snod kyi rnam pa tsam du brkos nas chu shing la sogs pa'i lo ma'i gzhi bting ba de'i phyir 'dab ma bting ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sa brkos pa'i 'dab ma bting nas zhes bya ba ni sa snod kyi rnam pa tsam du brkos nas chu shing la sogs pa'i lo ma'i gzhi bting ba de'i phyir 'dab ma bting ba zhes bya ste /
translated: The spread out leaves are the leaves of the banana plant, etc., spread out on the ground dug up like a vessel. Therefore, it is called spread out leaves.

original: de la yang 'bras chan dang tshod ma la sogs pa gzhan dag nas bza' bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang 'bras chan dang tshod ma la sogs pa gzhan dag nas bza' bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And on that, other food such as rice and vegetables are eaten.

original: skyo ba ni du ba pa yin la mi bde ba ni gdung bar gyur pa'o //ğŸ”½skal ba ngan pa ni dbul ba'am /
analyzed: skyo ba ni du ba pa yin la mi bde ba ni gdung bar gyur pa'o // skal ba ngan pa ni dbul ba'am /
translated: Discouragement is the same as discouragement and discomfort is the same as distress.

original: bsod nams chung ba'o //
analyzed: bsod nams chung ba'o //
translated: Bad fortune is the same as poverty or little merit.

original: gzhung gnyis pa ngan song ba zhes bya ba ni don kyang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhung gnyis pa ngan song ba zhes bya ba ni don kyang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: The second line, which is called the bad destinies, has the same meaning.

original: gus pa sngon du song ba can gyi shes par byed pa ni smras pa'o //
analyzed: gus pa sngon du song ba can gyi shes par byed pa ni smras pa'o //
translated: The one who is respectful is the speaker.

original: kham phor chag pa ni kham por gyi phyogs gcig chag pa'o //
analyzed: kham phor chag pa ni kham por gyi phyogs gcig chag pa'o //
translated: A broken pot is a pot with a part broken off.

original: shes rab can zhes bya ba ni rig pas 'jug pa'i phyir shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab can zhes bya ba ni rig pas 'jug pa'i phyir shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The one who is wise is the one who is endowed with wisdom because he engages in knowledge.

original: tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'thad pas tha snyad du byed pa'o //
analyzed: tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'thad pas tha snyad du byed pa'o //
translated: The one who is proper is the one who makes conventional expressions by means of logic.

original: 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du mdza' bor gyur gyis zhes bya ba la mchad du nyal bas na shin tu mdza' bor gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du mdza' bor gyur gyis zhes bya ba la mchad du nyal bas na shin tu mdza' bor gyur pa ste /
translated: The one who is assembled is the one who is conventionally a friend. The one who is very much a friend is the one who sleeps together.

original: rtag tu snying dang mi 'bral ba zhes bya ba dang sdug pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtag tu snying dang mi 'bral ba zhes bya ba dang sdug pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The one who is always inseparable from the heart is the one who is called dear, which means beloved.

original: rta la yang ljang pa ste /
analyzed: rta la yang ljang pa ste /
translated: The one who is green on the horse is the one who is called green on the horse.

original: nas so ba la sogs pa tshad du byas pa'i rta'i zas su rung bar bza' bar bya ba rtsva dag go //
analyzed: nas so ba la sogs pa tshad du byas pa'i rta'i zas su rung bar bza' bar bya ba rtsva dag go //
translated: Grass is the food for horses, measured by the handful, etc.

original: brang phrad pa ni lus kyis 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: brang phrad pa ni lus kyis 'khyud pa'o //
translated: Embracing with the body is the same as the previous.

original: bya rog dogs pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bya rog thams cad la dogs par 'gyur pa de bzhin du kho bo yang ngo //
analyzed: bya rog dogs pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bya rog thams cad la dogs par 'gyur pa de bzhin du kho bo yang ngo //
translated: â€œLike fearing crowsâ€ means just as one fears all crows, so do I.

original: bcom pa zhes bya ba ni nor dang phral bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bcom pa zhes bya ba ni nor dang phral bar gyur pa'o //
translated: â€œDefeatedâ€ means deprived of wealth.

original: pham pa zhes bya ba ni g-yul gyi gnas las bros par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: pham pa zhes bya ba ni g-yul gyi gnas las bros par gyur pa'o //
translated: â€œVanquishedâ€ means fleeing from the battlefield.

original: rgyal srid phrogs pa zhes bya ba ni dbang byed phrogs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal srid phrogs pa zhes bya ba ni dbang byed phrogs par gyur pa'o //
translated: â€œSeized the kingdomâ€ means taking control.

original: nyal ba'i khyim zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i don gyi khang pa'o //
analyzed: nyal ba'i khyim zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i don gyi khang pa'o //
translated: â€œHouse of sleepâ€ means a house for the purpose of living in the royal palace.

original: phal che bas zhes bya ba ni de gso ba'i phyir byin no zhes bya ba ni gso ba'i don du gtad pa'o //
analyzed: phal che bas zhes bya ba ni de gso ba'i phyir byin no zhes bya ba ni gso ba'i don du gtad pa'o //
translated: â€œThe majorityâ€ means â€œI gave it for their support,â€ meaning it was entrusted for the purpose of support.

original: bstod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rab tu gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bstod pa'o //
analyzed: bstod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rab tu gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bstod pa'o //
translated: For the sake of praise means for the sake of clear praise.

original: brnyas pa ni nga rgyal gyi brnyas pas brnyas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: brnyas pa ni nga rgyal gyi brnyas pas brnyas par gyur pa'o //
translated: Disdain means to be disdained through the disdain of pride.

original: rigs ngan pa las skyes pa ni rigs med pa las skyes par gyur pas so //
analyzed: rigs ngan pa las skyes pa ni rigs med pa las skyes par gyur pas so //
translated: Born into a low caste means born into a caste without lineage.

original: @103b 'das pa ni zhes bya ba ni shin tu 'das par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: @103b 'das pa ni zhes bya ba ni shin tu 'das par gyur pa'o //
translated: Long ago means having gone far away.

original: ci zhig lta zhing 'dug ces bya ba ni gnas skabs ci 'dra bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhig lta zhing 'dug ces bya ba ni gnas skabs ci 'dra bar gyur pa'o //
translated: What are you looking at? means what kind of situation has arisen?

original: de ltar mi nus mod kyi zhes bya ba ni ngas thams cad du khyod kyi bya ba byed par mi nus mod kyi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ltar mi nus mod kyi zhes bya ba ni ngas thams cad du khyod kyi bya ba byed par mi nus mod kyi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Although I am not able to do that means I am not able to do your work everywhere, is what is meant.

original: gyod ma gsol cig ces bya ba ni nyes pa byas pa smra bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gyod ma gsol cig ces bya ba ni nyes pa byas pa smra bar mi bya'o //
translated: Do not make a fuss means do not speak of the wrongdoing.

original: nyin zhag gi bza' ba bsgrubs nas zhes bya ba ni nyin zhag gnas pa'i bza' ba ni nyin zhag gi bza' ba ste /
analyzed: nyin zhag gi bza' ba bsgrubs nas zhes bya ba ni nyin zhag gnas pa'i bza' ba ni nyin zhag gi bza' ba ste /
translated: Having prepared a day's food means a day's food is food for staying one day.

original: gang de ltar bsgrubs nas 'tsho bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang de ltar bsgrubs nas 'tsho bar byed pa'o //
translated: Having prepared that, one should live.

original: dan kong gis zhes bya ba ni 'jim pa las byas pa'i ri lu skam po 'phen par rung ba'i phyir dan kong ngo ;
analyzed: dan kong gis zhes bya ba ni 'jim pa las byas pa'i ri lu skam po 'phen par rung ba'i phyir dan kong ngo ;
translated: â€œA clay ballâ€ is a dry lump of clay, suitable for throwing.

original: / glan par bya ba ni dgag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: / glan par bya ba ni dgag par bya ba'o //
translated: â€œTo be stoppedâ€ means to be blocked.

original: skyengs pa ni ngo tsha bar gyur nas so //
analyzed: skyengs pa ni ngo tsha bar gyur nas so //
translated: â€œEmbarrassedâ€ means ashamed.

original: bud med la chags par gyur nas zhes bya ba ni bud med la shin tu brkam par gyur pas so //
analyzed: bud med la chags par gyur nas zhes bya ba ni bud med la shin tu brkam par gyur pas so //
translated: â€œHaving become attached to womenâ€ means having become very greedy for women.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pas mchod pa dang zhes bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris kyis mchod pa'i lha'i bu mo'i gzugs la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan du zin kyang bzang mo'i phyir snang bar nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pas mchod pa dang zhes bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris kyis mchod pa'i lha'i bu mo'i gzugs la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan du zin kyang bzang mo'i phyir snang bar nus pa ma yin no //
translated: â€œThe worship of the Thirty-Threeâ€ means that even though the gods of the Thirty-Three have the particular forms of the celestial maidens, they are not able to appear before Bhadra.

original: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
analyzed: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snang bas gzhan skar ma'i gzhal med khang gi mdzes pa zil gyis gnon pa bzhin no zhes smos pa yin no //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snang bas gzhan skar ma'i gzhal med khang gi mdzes pa zil gyis gnon pa bzhin no zhes smos pa yin no //
translated: It is like the light of the sun outshining the beauty of the other celestial abodes of the stars.

original: tha mal pa'i skyes bu ni skyes bur shes par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: tha mal pa'i skyes bu ni skyes bur shes par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: â€œAn ordinary personâ€ means a person who is not recognized as a person.

original: de'i kun du spyod pa ni 'thad pa ste /
analyzed: de'i kun du spyod pa ni 'thad pa ste /
translated: His conduct is proper,

original: gdon mi za bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar bya ba'o //
translated: that is, he is certainly to be done.

original: sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa ni lus la sogs pa'i bya ba smad pa dag yin no //
analyzed: sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa ni lus la sogs pa'i bya ba smad pa dag yin no //
translated: The conduct of sinful dharmas is the despised actions of body, etc.

original: dal bus zhes bya ba ni dogs pa med par ro //
analyzed: dal bus zhes bya ba ni dogs pa med par ro //
translated: Slowly means without haste.

original: mi gtsang ba zhes bya ba ni mi gtsang bas khyab par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mi gtsang ba zhes bya ba ni mi gtsang bas khyab par gyur pa'o //
translated: Filthy means pervaded by filth.

original: lcags kyi phur pas btab pa ni bshang ba'i khang pa nas rkun ma 'jug pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lcags kyi phur pas btab pa ni bshang ba'i khang pa nas rkun ma 'jug pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Spiked with iron spikes is for the purpose of preventing thieves from entering the latrine.

original: dog pa ni 'jug par dka' ba yin la /ğŸ”½gdon pa ni rgal dka' bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dog pa ni 'jug par dka' ba yin la / gdon pa ni rgal dka' bar gyur pa'o //
translated: It is narrow because it is difficult to enter.ğŸ”½ It is difficult to get out of because it is difficult to escape.

original: kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni gnod pa skyed par byed pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni gnod pa skyed par byed pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: It is full of afflictions because it generates harm.

original: des rgyal po khros par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni tshig des khro ba skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: des rgyal po khros par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni tshig des khro ba skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: The king becomes angry with that person means that he generates anger with that statement.

original: rgyal po'i mthu la zhes bya ba ni de'i mthus te stobs kyis yul yongs su bsrung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal po'i mthu la zhes bya ba ni de'i mthus te stobs kyis yul yongs su bsrung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The king's power means that by his power, by his strength, the country is protected.

original: rgyal ba dang tshe ring pas zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba dang tshe ring ba 'phel bar gyur cig ces dug med par byas nas so //
analyzed: rgyal ba dang tshe ring pas zhes bya ba ni rgyal ba dang tshe ring ba 'phel bar gyur cig ces dug med par byas nas so //
translated: The words may the Victorious One and Long Life increase are uttered without poison, meaning may the Victorious One and Long Life increase.

original: @104a * // rngo thogs so zhes bya ba ni rang gi nus pas rnyed pa'i mchog don du gnyer bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: @104a * // rngo thogs so zhes bya ba ni rang gi nus pas rnyed pa'i mchog don du gnyer bar byed pa'o //
translated: The words I am able mean striving for the supreme goal that is attained through one's own ability.

original: btag tu la ba brgyad dang ldan pa'i shing rta ni cang shes kyi shing rta'o //
analyzed: btag tu la ba brgyad dang ldan pa'i shing rta ni cang shes kyi shing rta'o //
translated: A chariot with eight parts is a well-constructed chariot.

original: rdo leb bzang po ni dri bzang po la sogs pa btag tu rung ba'i rdo leb po //
analyzed: rdo leb bzang po ni dri bzang po la sogs pa btag tu rung ba'i rdo leb po //
translated: A good stone slab is a slab suitable for applying perfumes, etc.

original: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don dang rjes su 'brel ba'i tshigs su bcad pa klog pa'o //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don dang rjes su 'brel ba'i tshigs su bcad pa klog pa'o //
translated: The words with the melody of verse mean reciting verses that are connected with the desired meaning.

original: gcig tu zhes bya ba ni lhan cig tu'o //
analyzed: gcig tu zhes bya ba ni lhan cig tu'o //
translated: The word together means simultaneously.

original: gte'u bzung bar gyur nas zhes bya ba ni khye'u dang bu mo la sogs pa gte'u byas pa'i rgyu can gyi chad pa byas nas so //
analyzed: gte'u bzung bar gyur nas zhes bya ba ni khye'u dang bu mo la sogs pa gte'u byas pa'i rgyu can gyi chad pa byas nas so //
translated: Having taken up the treasure, meaning having imposed a penalty that is the cause of making a boy or girl a treasure, etc.

original: dpya nar ma ni rigs pa'i babs yin la /
analyzed: dpya nar ma ni rigs pa'i babs yin la /
translated: Regular taxes are the regular share.

original: gla skyes ni sho gam gyi gnas la sogs pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: gla skyes ni sho gam gyi gnas la sogs pa las byung ba'o //
translated: The tax is that which arises from the places of toll, etc.

original: shu ba'i ming can gyi g-yan pa'i nad kyi dbang du byas pa ni des btab par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: shu ba'i ming can gyi g-yan pa'i nad kyi dbang du byas pa ni des btab par gyur pa'o //
translated: The one who is affected by the disease called white spot is the one who is afflicted by that.

original: rta skad 'byin pa ni rta'i skad sgrog par ro //
analyzed: rta skad 'byin pa ni rta'i skad sgrog par ro //
translated: The one who neighs like a horse is the one who neighs like a horse.

original: yo byad kyi khyad par gyis zhes bya ba ni gzugs khyad par du 'phags pa sgrub par byed pa'i rin po che la sogs pas so //
analyzed: yo byad kyi khyad par gyis zhes bya ba ni gzugs khyad par du 'phags pa sgrub par byed pa'i rin po che la sogs pas so //
translated: The one who is distinguished by special equipment is the one who is distinguished by special equipment such as jewels.

original: gzugs dang ldan par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs khyad par can gyis nye bar mtshon par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs khyad par can gyis nye bar mtshon par gyur pa'o //
translated: The one who is endowed with form is the one who is characterized by special form.

original: yol bas bskor ba zhes bya ba ni gos kyis bar du gcad par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yol bas bskor ba zhes bya ba ni gos kyis bar du gcad par gyur pa'o //
translated: The one who is surrounded by a curtain is the one who is separated by a curtain.

original: chag pa dang bcas pas mthong ma thag tu sems 'brel par gyur pas na rab tu chags pa'o //
analyzed: chag pa dang bcas pas mthong ma thag tu sems 'brel par gyur pas na rab tu chags pa'o //
translated: The one who is passionate is the one who, as soon as he sees the woman, has his mind immediately affected by passion.

original: ma bslabs par mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis mkhas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ma bslabs par mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis mkhas par gyur pa'o //
translated: The one who is uneducated but wise is the one who is wise by nature.

original: khri dra ba can ni rtsva'i skud pa las byas pa'i khri yin te /
analyzed: khri dra ba can ni rtsva'i skud pa las byas pa'i khri yin te /
translated: The â€œwoven-straw matâ€ is a mat made of straw.

original: dra ba dang 'dra bar sbyangs par gyur pa'o //

analyzed: dga' ba ni 'dir srid pa'i rnam grangs yin gyi yid mgu ba'i rnam grangs ni ma yin pa de bas na 'dir srid pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid bde ba smos pa yin no //
translated: Here, joy is a synonym for existence, not a synonym for mental satisfaction. Therefore, here mental satisfaction associated with existence is mentioned.

original: bskal pa bzang po ni dge bar gyur pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po ni dge bar gyur pa nyid yin te /
translated: The Fortunate Aeon is the Fortunate Aeon of Virtue.

original: dpal gyi bskal pa bzang po ni bskal pa bzang po'i dpal yin te /
analyzed: dpal gyi bskal pa bzang po ni bskal pa bzang po'i dpal yin te /
translated: The glory of the Fortunate Aeon is the glory of the Fortunate Aeon.

original: de dam pas khyad par du 'phags pas 'gro bar byed pas so //
analyzed: de dam pas khyad par du 'phags pas 'gro bar byed pas so //
translated: Since it is the most excellent, it is the Fortunate Aeon of Glory.

original: phan pa ni phan 'dogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: phan pa ni phan 'dogs par byed pa'o //
translated: Beneficial means helpful.

original: 'dod pa thams cad ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis so //
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis so //
translated: All desires are the five sense objects.

original: rnam pa mang pos phan btags pa byas pa'i phyir mang du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa mang pos phan btags pa byas pa'i phyir mang du mdzad pa'o //
translated: It is done much because it has been done in many ways.

original: skye bo mang po ni skye bo'i tshogs yin la /
analyzed: skye bo mang po ni skye bo'i tshogs yin la /
translated: Many people are a group of people.

original: rjes su brtse ba ni thugs brtse bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su brtse ba ni thugs brtse bar gyur pa'o //
translated: Subsequent compassion is compassion that has arisen.

original: sems sems kyis shes nas zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes pa'i sgo nas phan tshun rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid thob par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sems sems kyis shes nas zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes pa'i sgo nas phan tshun rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid thob par gyur pa'o //
translated: â€œHaving understood mind by mindâ€ means that they have attained sameness because they have mutually entered into each other through complete understanding.

original: longs spyod spel bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol du gyur pa'i longs spyod 'byor bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: longs spyod spel bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol du gyur pa'i longs spyod 'byor bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: â€œIn order to increase enjoymentâ€ means in order to increase the enjoyment of future worlds.

original: glog 'gyu ba zhes bya ba ni yud tsam 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: glog 'gyu ba zhes bya ba ni yud tsam 'byin pa'o //
translated: â€œLike a flash of lightningâ€ means like a momentary flash.

original: rigs med pa las skyes pa 'di ni mchog ste zhes bya ba ni rigs dma' ba las skyes par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rigs med pa las skyes pa 'di ni mchog ste zhes bya ba ni rigs dma' ba las skyes par gyur pa'o //
translated: â€œThis is the bestâ€ means that it is born from the highest family.

original: bsad pa ni srog dang bral bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bsad pa ni srog dang bral bar gyur pa'o //
translated: â€œKilledâ€ means deprived of life.

original: 'di la cher sems pa yin te zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la cher sems pa yin te zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'o //
translated: â€œOne who has great faith in thisâ€ means one who is delighted.

original: tshang zhes bya ba ni @108a * //
analyzed: tshang zhes bya ba ni @108a * //
translated: â€œNestâ€ means

original: gnas yin no //
analyzed: gnas yin no //
translated: a dwelling.

original: yul rmu gas par gyur pa na zhes bya ba ni sprin gyis khyab par gyur pa na'o //
analyzed: yul rmu gas par gyur pa na zhes bya ba ni sprin gyis khyab par gyur pa na'o //
translated: â€œWhen the country is covered with cloudsâ€ means when it is pervaded by clouds.

original: rlung dang nyi mas yongs su skams pa ni rlung dang nyi ma dang ldan par gyur pas so //
analyzed: rlung dang nyi mas yongs su skams pa ni rlung dang nyi ma dang ldan par gyur pas so //
translated: â€œDried by the wind and sunâ€ means dried by the wind and sun.

original: ri mo can zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i rnam pa'i mdangs nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ri mo can zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i rnam pa'i mdangs nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: â€œHaving linesâ€ means having the luster of blue lines.

original: ma brtags spyod ces bya ba ni spyod pa med par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ma brtags spyod ces bya ba ni spyod pa med par byed pa'o //
translated: â€œNot examiningâ€ means not examining.

original: bzod par gyis zhes bya ba ni tshig 'jam pos bzod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bzod par gyis zhes bya ba ni tshig 'jam pos bzod par byed pa'o //
translated: â€œForbearanceâ€ means forbearance with gentle words.

original: tshogs can zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: tshogs can zhes bya ba la /
translated: â€œHaving an assemblyâ€ means

original: tshogs ni 'dus pa yin la /
analyzed: tshogs ni 'dus pa yin la /
translated: an assembly is a gathering.

original: tshogs 'di la yod pa'i phyir tshogs can te sde dpon chen po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: tshogs 'di la yod pa'i phyir tshogs can te sde dpon chen po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Because it exists in this assembly, it has an assembly. It means a great leader.

original: mi mkhas pa ni blo dang mi ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mi mkhas pa ni blo dang mi ldan pa'o //
translated: â€œUnskilledâ€ means not having intelligence.

original: tshol bar byed pa ni rab tu don du gnyer bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: tshol bar byed pa ni rab tu don du gnyer bar byed pa'o //
translated: â€œSeekingâ€ means striving for.

original: re re'i tshig tu smra ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang zag gsum po cha gcig smra bar mngon par 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: re re'i tshig tu smra ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang zag gsum po cha gcig smra bar mngon par 'dod pa yin te /
translated: â€œSpeaking a word eachâ€ means the three persons desire to speak a part.

original: 'di ltar rgyal po dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'i bram ze dang / drang srong gi mchog go //
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyal po dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'i bram ze dang / drang srong gi mchog go //
translated: Thus, the king, the brahmin who possesses the qualities, and the supreme sage.

original: gcig ces bya ba ni rgyal po'i tshig gcig smra bar 'gyur gyi gnyis pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig ces bya ba ni rgyal po'i tshig gcig smra bar 'gyur gyi gnyis pa ni ma yin te /
translated: One means that the king speaks one word, not a second.

original: tshig gcig gis rgyal po'i bka' sgrub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'dir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshig gcig gis rgyal po'i bka' sgrub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'dir 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning is that he accomplishes the king's command with one word.

original: skye dgu 'dul bar byed pa de'i phyir rgyal po de nyid ston pa nyid la /
analyzed: skye dgu 'dul bar byed pa de'i phyir rgyal po de nyid ston pa nyid la /
translated: Because he disciplines the people, the king himself is the teacher.

original: rang gi bdag po gnyis med pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir de nyid gang zag gnyis med pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi bdag po gnyis med pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir de nyid gang zag gnyis med pa'o //
translated: Because he has no other master, he is the one who is without a second person.

original: cha gcig smra ba'i blo gros kyis zhes bya ba ni rgyal po nyid ngag gi cha gcig brjod cing smra ba gdon mi za bar bya ba'i don ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: cha gcig smra ba'i blo gros kyis zhes bya ba ni rgyal po nyid ngag gi cha gcig brjod cing smra ba gdon mi za bar bya ba'i don ston par byed pa'o //
translated: By the intelligence that speaks one part means that the king himself speaks and expresses one part of the speech, and he undoubtedly teaches the meaning to be expressed.

original: gzhan dag ni gcig nyid ni bcom ldan 'das yin na /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni gcig nyid ni bcom ldan 'das yin na /
translated: Others say: If the one is the Blessed One,

original: 'or cig tshig tu gsung gi lan gnyis su bskor ba ma yin pa dang / de nyid ston pa yin la /
analyzed: 'or cig tshig tu gsung gi lan gnyis su bskor ba ma yin pa dang / de nyid ston pa yin la /
translated: he speaks one word, not two, and he is the teacher.

original: de nyid gang zag zla med pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid gang zag zla med pa yin te /
translated: He is the peerless person.

original: de nyid kyang gang gi cha gcig gsung bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes sems so //
analyzed: de nyid kyang gang gi cha gcig gsung bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes sems so //
translated: He is the one who will speak of the one part of that.

original: chos kyi tshul la mi gnas pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos la nges par gnas par mi 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi tshul la mi gnas pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos la nges par gnas par mi 'gyur pa'o //
translated: He who does not abide in the Dharma way is one who will not abide in the Dharma.

original: gang yang sdig pa'i lta ba dang zhes bya ba ni sdig pa'i lta ba ngan pa dag log pa'i lta ba can dang / gang yang tshul khrims g-yo 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang yang sdig pa'i lta ba dang zhes bya ba ni sdig pa'i lta ba ngan pa dag log pa'i lta ba can dang / gang yang tshul khrims g-yo 'gyur ba'o //
translated: He who has evil views is one who has evil, wrong views.ğŸ”½He who is a woman without a self is one who is overcome by the absence of a master.

original: bud med bdag med ces bya ba ni bdag po'i bgo ba dang bral bas zil gyis mnan par gyur pa de la gal te ming po @108b bcu yod par gyur pa na'o //
analyzed: bud med bdag med ces bya ba ni bdag po'i bgo ba dang bral bas zil gyis mnan par gyur pa de la gal te ming po @108b bcu yod par gyur pa na'o //
translated: If she has ten brothers, what is the use?

original: ci zhig phan zhes bya ba ni rdzas thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhig phan zhes bya ba ni rdzas thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa'o //
translated: She is devoid of all wealth.

original: 'di gsum cung zad mi dgos pa'o zhes bya ba ni snying po med pa nyid dang dgos pa yod pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di gsum cung zad mi dgos pa'o zhes bya ba ni snying po med pa nyid dang dgos pa yod pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: These three are of no use at all, because they are without essence and have no purpose.

original: longs ma spyad par zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po phal cher yongs su longs ma spyad pa dang / sol ba dang tha snyad du byed pa'i phyir sol ba pa ste /ğŸ”½gang sol ba byas nas 'tshong bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: longs ma spyad par zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po phal cher yongs su longs ma spyad pa dang / sol ba dang tha snyad du byed pa'i phyir sol ba pa ste / gang sol ba byas nas 'tshong bar byed pa'am /
translated: for the most part.ğŸ”½The term â€œcharcoalâ€ is used figuratively because he makes a living by selling charcoal.

original: 'di la sol ba dgos pa'i phyir sol ba ste lcags mgar ro //
analyzed: 'di la sol ba dgos pa'i phyir sol ba ste lcags mgar ro //
translated: Or, the term â€œcharcoalâ€ refers to a blacksmith because he needs charcoal.ğŸ”½Because he is afraid of damaging his clothes, he always works naked. Therefore, his clothes are worn out without being used.

original: de gos nyams pas 'jigs pas rtag tu gcer bu kho na las byed pa de'i phyir de'i gos longs ma spyad par zad par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du lham dang btsun mo dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: de gos nyams pas 'jigs pas rtag tu gcer bu kho na las byed pa de'i phyir de'i gos longs ma spyad par zad par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du lham dang btsun mo dag kyang ngo //
translated: Similarly, his shoes and wives are also like that.

original: dka' thub ni mi tshangs par spyod pa las ldog pa'o //ğŸ”½shing rtas tha snyad du byed pa'i phyir shing rta 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: dka' thub ni mi tshangs par spyod pa las ldog pa'o // shing rtas tha snyad du byed pa'i phyir shing rta 'dren pa'o //
translated: Austerity is the avoidance of sexual intercourse.ğŸ”½He is called a â€œcharioteerâ€ because he is a charioteer.

original: gtun shing gis brdeg par 'os pa yin pa'i phyir gtun shing gis brdeg pa'i rigs so //
analyzed: gtun shing gis brdeg par 'os pa yin pa'i phyir gtun shing gis brdeg pa'i rigs so //
translated: He is called â€œfit to be beaten with a pestleâ€ because he deserves to be beaten with a pestle.

original: rngams cher 'jog pa ni gzhogs ma cher 'byin pa'i shing rlag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rngams cher 'jog pa ni gzhogs ma cher 'byin pa'i shing rlag par byed pa'o //
translated: The one who is very angry is the one who cuts down the tree that is not leaning in that direction.

original: kha lo sgyur ba ni nyam nga ba la sogs pa spangs pa'i phyir rtse gcig tu blta bar bsngags pa yin na gang yang yon por lta bar 'gyur ba gtun shing gis brdeg par 'os pa yin no //
analyzed: kha lo sgyur ba ni nyam nga ba la sogs pa spangs pa'i phyir rtse gcig tu blta bar bsngags pa yin na gang yang yon por lta bar 'gyur ba gtun shing gis brdeg par 'os pa yin no //
translated: The one who is the charioteer is praised for looking straight ahead in order to avoid danger, etc. But the one who looks crookedly is worthy of being beaten with a club.

original: pho nyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyal po'i thad las phrin blangs pa gang yin pa de bya ba gzhan gyis brel bas gzhan pho nyar gtong bar byed pa de gnyi g-yang gtun shing gis brdeg par 'os pa yin no //
analyzed: pho nyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyal po'i thad las phrin blangs pa gang yin pa de bya ba gzhan gyis brel bas gzhan pho nyar gtong bar byed pa de gnyi g-yang gtun shing gis brdeg par 'os pa yin no //
translated: The one who is the messenger is the one who, having received a message from the king, sends another messenger because he is busy with other duties. Both of these are worthy of being beaten with a club.

original: mngag gzhug pa ni zho shas 'tsho ba yin te /
analyzed: mngag gzhug pa ni zho shas 'tsho ba yin te /
translated: The one who is the servant is the one who lives by wages.

original: de bdag pos las la nges par sbyar ba ni yang nges kyang gzhan sbyor bar byed pa de ni mngags pas mngags pa yin no //
analyzed: de bdag pos las la nges par sbyar ba ni yang nges kyang gzhan sbyor bar byed pa de ni mngags pas mngags pa yin no //
translated: The one who is the servant of a servant is the one who is employed by his master to do the work of another.

original: rigs sun 'byin pa ni bdag po'i khyim dang / pha'i khyim du spyod pa ma yin pa lhag par spyod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rigs sun 'byin pa ni bdag po'i khyim dang / pha'i khyim du spyod pa ma yin pa lhag par spyod par byed pa'o //
translated: The disrespect is the conduct that is not in the house of the master, or in the house of the father, but is excessive.

original: ba lang rdzi ni nags na spyod pa yin la /
analyzed: ba lang rdzi ni nags na spyod pa yin la /
translated: The cowherd is one who lives in the forest.

original: 'dreg mkhan ni grong na spyod pa yin na phyin ci log tu 'jug pa'i phyir gtun shing gis brdeg par rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dreg mkhan ni grong na spyod pa yin na phyin ci log tu 'jug pa'i phyir gtun shing gis brdeg par rigs pa yin no //
translated: The barber is one who lives in the village. It is proper to beat with a pestle because he engages in the opposite.

original: rgyal pos smras pa lan cig yin zhes bya ba ni 'or cig yin no //
analyzed: rgyal pos smras pa lan cig yin zhes bya ba ni 'or cig yin no //
translated: The king said, One time means once.

original: bu mo sbyin pa'ang lan cig yin zhes bya ba ni khyo shi nas @109a * //
analyzed: bu mo sbyin pa'ang lan cig yin zhes bya ba ni khyo shi nas @109a * //
translated: The giving of a daughter is also one time means that after the husband dies,

original: yang sbyin par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yang sbyin par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not to be given again.

original: 'phags pas gzigs pa lan cig pas bsod nams la sogs pa'i don nye bar bsags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pas gzigs pa lan cig pas bsod nams la sogs pa'i don nye bar bsags par 'gyur ro //
translated: The noble one sees once means that the accumulation of merit and so on will be made.

original: phyogs chung dang zhes bya ba ni 'khor nyung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs chung dang zhes bya ba ni 'khor nyung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The small direction means the small retinue.

original: dogs par gyur to zhes bya ba ni gsad par gyur pa zhe'am /
analyzed: dogs par gyur to zhes bya ba ni gsad par gyur pa zhe'am /
translated: It became doubtful means it became doubtful whether he would be killed,

original: 'di ltar rgyal srid dang bral bar dogs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyal srid dang bral bar dogs par gyur pa'o //
translated: or it became doubtful that he would be separated from the kingdom.

original: brnyas par ni glen par ro //
analyzed: brnyas par ni glen par ro //
translated: The fool is despised.

original: kha cig ni yan lag rgyas par gyur pa'o zhe'o //
analyzed: kha cig ni yan lag rgyas par gyur pa'o zhe'o //
translated: Some say: The fool is one whose limbs are undeveloped.

original: gang cung zhig ma dpyad par smra bas na 'chal ba'i tshig tu smra ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang cung zhig ma dpyad par smra bas na 'chal ba'i tshig tu smra ba zhes bya'o //
translated: He is called one who speaks loose words because he speaks without analyzing anything at all.

original: gos gyon pa ni 'dir dbul por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gos gyon pa ni 'dir dbul por gyur pa'o //
translated: He is called one who wears clothes because he is poor.

original: bshes ma yin par te 'dris pa ma yin par ro //
analyzed: bshes ma yin par te 'dris pa ma yin par ro //
translated: He is called one who is not a friend because he is not an acquaintance.

original: shin tu snang bas na shin tu gtum pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu snang bas na shin tu gtum pa'o //
translated: He is called one who is very fierce because he is very bright.

original: lhag par sten pa ni lhag par sten par byed pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par sten pa ni lhag par sten par byed pa'o //
translated: He is called one who is very devoted because he is very devoted.

original: gzhan gyi nor la sems pa ni gang zhig rtag tu gzhan gyi nor la che ga mo 'di la rdzas 'di yod ces gzhan gyi nor la sems par byed cing bdag nyid kyi nor sgrub pa'i 'bad rtsol byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi nor la sems pa ni gang zhig rtag tu gzhan gyi nor la che ga mo 'di la rdzas 'di yod ces gzhan gyi nor la sems par byed cing bdag nyid kyi nor sgrub pa'i 'bad rtsol byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: He is called one who thinks about others' wealth because he always thinks about others' wealth, saying, This person has this much wealth, and he makes an effort to acquire his own wealth.

original: rtag tu bdag nyid la sdug dang zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rtag tu bdag nyid la sdug dang zhes bya ba la /
translated: He is called one who always thinks about himself as being attractive,ğŸ”½and so on.

original: sems pa zhes bya ba rjes su 'jug ste /
analyzed: sems pa zhes bya ba rjes su 'jug ste /
translated: The word thinks is understood here.

original: gang zhig 'bad rtsol med par bdag nyid la rtag tu sdug pa'i dngos por 'dod do //
analyzed: gang zhig 'bad rtsol med par bdag nyid la rtag tu sdug pa'i dngos por 'dod do //
translated: He is the one who is always desired as a pleasant thing by himself without effort.

original: shing rta'i 'khor los gsad par bya ba zhes bya ba ni shing rta'i 'khor los srog dang dbral bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: shing rta'i 'khor los gsad par bya ba zhes bya ba ni shing rta'i 'khor los srog dang dbral bar bya ba'o //
translated: He is the one who is to be killed by the wheel of a chariot, that is, the one whose life is to be taken away by the wheel of a chariot.

original: mtshon gyi dbye ba la mkhas pas na mtshon gtong shes pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon gyi dbye ba la mkhas pas na mtshon gtong shes pa'o //
translated: He is the one who knows how to throw a weapon because he is skilled in the classification of weapons.

original: mtshams ni shing dag gi mtshams rjes su mthun par sbyor ba'o //ğŸ”½gyad dang lhan cig ji ltar bya ba'i dogs ni rigs pa'o //
analyzed: mtshams ni shing dag gi mtshams rjes su mthun par sbyor ba'o // gyad dang lhan cig ji ltar bya ba'i dogs ni rigs pa'o //
translated: He is the one who is in the right place, that is, the one who is in the right place in relation to the trees.ğŸ”½He is the one who is in the right place in relation to the wrestlers, that is, the one who is in the right place in relation to the wrestlers.

original: bdag po nyid kyi tshul du skyes bu gsum brgyud pas yongs su longs spyod pas na lan gsum brgyud pa'o //
analyzed: bdag po nyid kyi tshul du skyes bu gsum brgyud pas yongs su longs spyod pas na lan gsum brgyud pa'o //
translated: He is the one who is enjoyed by three generations of his family, that is, the one who is enjoyed by three generations of his family in the manner of a master.

original: gcig dang gnas pa zhes bya ba ni skyes bu gcig dang yang dag par mgu bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gcig dang gnas pa zhes bya ba ni skyes bu gcig dang yang dag par mgu bar byed pa'o //
translated: He is the one who is pleased with one person, that is, the one who is pleased with one person.

original: drang por smra ba ni bden par smra ba'o //
analyzed: drang por smra ba ni bden par smra ba'o //
translated: He is the one who speaks straightforwardly, that is, the one who speaks truthfully.

original: gzhan gyi rgyus zhes bya ba ni 'ga' zhig tu rgyal po btsun mo ta ra'i don du bsad par gyur to snyam du sems par 'gyur ba de bas na gzhan gyi rgyus zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyus zhes bya ba ni 'ga' zhig tu rgyal po btsun mo ta ra'i don du bsad par gyur to snyam du sems par 'gyur ba de bas na gzhan gyi rgyus zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: By another's hand means that one might think that someone else, for the sake of Queen TarÄ, might kill the king. Therefore, by another's hand is taught.

original: rgyags zhes bya ba ni des bde ba spel bar byed pa dang sgrub par byed pas na rgyags so //
analyzed: rgyags zhes bya ba ni des bde ba spel bar byed pa dang sgrub par byed pas na rgyags so //
translated: Intoxication means that it increases and establishes pleasure.

original: 'khor bar 'khor zhes bya ba ni 'khor @109b bdag tu yongs su 'khor bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor bar 'khor zhes bya ba ni 'khor @109b bdag tu yongs su 'khor bar gyur pa'o //
translated: Revolving in cyclic existence means revolving in the cycle of self.

original: tshogs bsags pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i longs spyod longs spyod pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs bsags pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i longs spyod longs spyod pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Accumulating a collection means possessing the enjoyment of the pleasures of happiness.

original: nya sgong zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'bras bu ma skyes pa kho nar 'jig par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: nya sgong zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'bras bu ma skyes pa kho nar 'jig par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Like a fish in a net and so on means that the result is destroyed even before it arises.

original: yon tan med pa ni 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: yon tan med pa ni 'gal ba yin te /
translated: The absence of qualities is contradictory,

original: nyin mo dang mtshan mo phan tshun lhan cig mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: nyin mo dang mtshan mo phan tshun lhan cig mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'gal ba yin no //
translated: like the contradiction of day and night not coexisting with each other.

original: gos rnams brdegs par gyur na zhes bya ba ni bcags par gyur na'o //
analyzed: gos rnams brdegs par gyur na zhes bya ba ni bcags par gyur na'o //
translated: When the clothes are beaten means when they are beaten.

original: chud gzhan par bya ba'i zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam la yin par bya ba'o //
analyzed: chud gzhan par bya ba'i zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam la yin par bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase â€œin the otherâ€ refers to the path of seeing.

original: skyes bu smad par bya ba yin pas na skyes bu ngan pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu smad par bya ba yin pas na skyes bu ngan pa'o //
translated: A bad person is one who is contemptible.

original: mi 'phrod pa ni yon tan 'jig par byed pa'o //ğŸ”½rgyal po brdzun du smra ba tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi 'phrod pa ni yon tan 'jig par byed pa'o // rgyal po brdzun du smra ba tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te /
translated: Unwholesome means that which destroys good qualities.

original: 'jigs pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jigs pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not proper for a king to tell lies, because he has no fear.

original: blo ldan don rnam par dpyod par byad pa'i tshe rmongs par gyur pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no //
analyzed: blo ldan don rnam par dpyod par byad pa'i tshe rmongs par gyur pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not proper for a wise person to be confused when analyzing an object.

original: don med par zhes bya ba ni dgos pa med par ro //
analyzed: don med par zhes bya ba ni dgos pa med par ro //
translated: Without a purpose means without a reason.

original: nyin par ni nyi ma'i 'od dang nye bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: nyin par ni nyi ma'i 'od dang nye bar gyur pa'o //
translated: In the daytime means when the sun is shining.

original: 'grangs la zhes bya ba ni shin tu ngoms par ro //
analyzed: 'grangs la zhes bya ba ni shin tu ngoms par ro //
translated: Satiated means completely satisfied.

original: gyod rma ba ni bslu bar ro //
analyzed: gyod rma ba ni bslu bar ro //
translated: To deceive means to mislead.

original: gdams ngag don du gnyer ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gdams ngag don du gnyer ba med pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'dod pa'o //
translated: To have no desire for instruction means to have no interest in it.

original: gnyid kyis gnod pa ni gnyid kyis gzir bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gnyid kyis gnod pa ni gnyid kyis gzir bar gyur pa'o //
translated: To be harmed by sleep means to be overcome by sleep.

original: g-yul du dpa' bo blta ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la g-yul ngogs su dpa' bo'i nus pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: g-yul du dpa' bo blta ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la g-yul ngogs su dpa' bo'i nus pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase to see a hero in battle and so on means that the power of a hero is clearly seen in the midst of battle.

original: dug rno ba ni shin tu rno ba ste /
analyzed: dug rno ba ni shin tu rno ba ste /
translated: The phrase to see a sharp poison means a very sharp poison.

original: de'i sman gyi nus pa gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sman gyi nus pa gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase to see the power of an antidote to that means the power of a medicine.

original: bza' btung yod par gyur na bza' ba dang btung ba sbyin par bya ba'i phyir gnyen rnams la blta ba yin no //
analyzed: bza' btung yod par gyur na bza' ba dang btung ba sbyin par bya ba'i phyir gnyen rnams la blta ba yin no //
translated: The phrase to see relatives when there is food and drink means to give food and drink.

original: don dang rnam par dpyad pa'i dus gang yin pa la mkhas pas blta bar bya ba'i skabs yin no //
analyzed: don dang rnam par dpyad pa'i dus gang yin pa la mkhas pas blta bar bya ba'i skabs yin no //
translated: The phrase to see the occasion for the wise to investigate the meaning means the occasion for the wise to investigate the meaning.

original: khyim pa'i le lo ni ma legs pa chen po yin la 'dod ldan pa yang ste /
analyzed: khyim pa'i le lo ni ma legs pa chen po yin la 'dod ldan pa yang ste /
translated: The phrase the laziness of householders is a great misfortune means that householders are attached to desire.

original: khyim pa le los bcom pa ma legs pa'o //
analyzed: khyim pa le los bcom pa ma legs pa'o //
translated: The phrase to be destroyed by the laziness of householders means to be destroyed by the misfortune of householders.

original: ma bslabs shing dbyigs byed pa spang bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: ma bslabs shing dbyigs byed pa spang bar bya ba yin te /
translated: The phrase to abandon the untrained and the quarrelsome means to abandon the untrained and the quarrelsome.

original: lhag par rgyug pa yang skyes mchog khyu mchog la sogs pa la gnod par byed cing gdung bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag kyang spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: lhag par rgyug pa yang skyes mchog khyu mchog la sogs pa la gnod par byed cing gdung bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag kyang spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: In particular, the supreme victors, the best of men, etc., should abandon the harm and torment of others.

original: gnod pa @110a * //
analyzed: gnod pa @110a * //
translated: Harm is

original: ste bzhos pas be'u la gnod par gyur pa de yang ngo //
analyzed: ste bzhos pas be'u la gnod par gyur pa de yang ngo //
translated: harm to a calf by milking.

original: bya sreg pa zhes bya ba nam mkha' yongs su zad pa'i 'jigs pas shin tu mthon por mi 'phur ba dang / chu skyar 'jigs par bya ba ma yin pas 'jigs par byed pa dang / rdul 'bigs par byed cing rdul za bar byed pa'i srin bu de rdul yongs su zad pas 'jigs pa'i phyir shin tu mang du mi za ba dang /
analyzed: bya sreg pa zhes bya ba nam mkha' yongs su zad pa'i 'jigs pas shin tu mthon por mi 'phur ba dang / chu skyar 'jigs par bya ba ma yin pas 'jigs par byed pa dang / rdul 'bigs par byed cing rdul za bar byed pa'i srin bu de rdul yongs su zad pas 'jigs pa'i phyir shin tu mang du mi za ba dang /
translated: The partridge, fearing the exhaustion of the sky, does not fly very high; the heron, fearing the exhaustion of water, makes a frightening sound; the worm, fearing the exhaustion of dust, eats dust and pierces the dust;

original: srin bu lta bu che gsher ni rtag tu 'jigs par bya ba ma yin pa la 'jigs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: srin bu lta bu che gsher ni rtag tu 'jigs par bya ba ma yin pa la 'jigs par byed pa'o //
translated: the young of large animals, fearing the exhaustion of grass, are always frightened by what is not frightening.

original: tshul khrims 'chal ba ni gzhan gyi chung ma la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal ba ni gzhan gyi chung ma la 'jug pa'o //
translated: The immoral engage in sexual intercourse with the wives of others.

original: rigs kyi phyir ni gcig btang zhing zhes bya ba ni rigs 'jig pa yang dag par 'byung bar gyur ba na sems can gcig yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi phyir ni gcig btang zhing zhes bya ba ni rigs 'jig pa yang dag par 'byung bar gyur ba na sems can gcig yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: When the destruction of the family is imminent, one should give up one person, etc.

original: rgyal po'i dkor mdzod ma bsams par zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rgyal po'i dkor mdzod ma bsams par zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Without thinking of the king's treasury, etc.

original: rgyal po'i yul gyi rgyal po'i dkor mdzod gang yin pa de ni ma bsams par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing lam song ste don mthun stobs mchog ma bsams par 'ga' zhig tu de'i rkyen gyis de 'jig par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rgyal po'i yul gyi rgyal po'i dkor mdzod gang yin pa de ni ma bsams par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing lam song ste don mthun stobs mchog ma bsams par 'ga' zhig tu de'i rkyen gyis de 'jig par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The king's treasury is what belongs to the king of the country. Without thinking of that, one should give it up if it is destroyed for that reason.

original: skal ba med pa ni tshul ngan pa'o //
analyzed: skal ba med pa ni tshul ngan pa'o //
translated: Unfortunate means of bad character.

original: lta bas mi ngoms pa zhes bya ba ni lta bas chog par mi byed pa'o ;
analyzed: lta bas mi ngoms pa zhes bya ba ni lta bas chog par mi byed pa'o ;
translated: Insatiable in looking means not satisfied with looking.

original: / rgyal po ni 'khor los rgyur ba'o //
analyzed: / rgyal po ni 'khor los rgyur ba'o //
translated: King means a universal monarch.

original: ri bo ni ri rab po //
analyzed: ri bo ni ri rab po //
translated: Mountain means Mount Meru.

original: rigs ldan zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam pa'o //
